feed.title: Montreal River Harbour - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Montreal River Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:19 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow or freezing rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets after midnight. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain mixed with ice pellets ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 50 in the morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few rain showers changing to a few flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
